name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11
overview: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11 is a golfing simulation video game in the PGA Tour series developed by EA Tiburon and published by Electronic Arts. It was released in 2010 for the PlayStation 3, Wii, Xbox 360 and iOS. The game is the first in the series to support the PlayStation Move controller for the Sony PlayStation 3. As with Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10, the Wii version utilizes Wii MotionPlus. This edition of Tiger Woods PGA Tour is the first to feature someone on the cover other than Tiger himself. The privilege was given to the Northern Irish golfer Rory McIlroy, who was the first person to win a PGA Tour event before their 21st birthday since Tiger Woods.
